answers.answer: 158/95.its been like this since last week. And last nite they told me to go in coz they found alot of protien in my urine.they collect 24hours urine aple to me yesterday and thats what they found.sometimes its low but sometimes islts high.they told me I might have preclampsia

Did they give you meds? Mine has be 170/90 and they gave me different meds. To bring it down. They did say if it goes up again o will have the baby. At the stage you are in baby will be perfectly fine. Am just 34 weeks and my blood pressure was the same as yours this morning. I think because you are that far along they may just have you deliver. Am getting induced on the 30th of Dec at 37 weeks.

No they didnt mention any meds..maybe I can mention that to them I have gestational diabetes too.but I control it thru diet no meds either. They told me today, that if everything still not good.they mite do the cs on monday.im 37 weeks by then.

36 weeks was full term for the longest time before they changed it to 37 which is now considered full term. Since your baby is considered or will be by the time they would induce they will probably go ahead and do so. It is doubtful if they can not see it stabilize that they would risk the health of you and baby when they can deliver a healthy term baby soon. 36 weeks is not too early for a medical induction where you and baby can be monitored from the start and lots of women deliver naturally by that time. Good luck and hope things go well for you.
Thank you..ya they planning to do my cesarian this coming monday.coz my blood pressure still fluctuate sometimes.im just thinking my baby will be here soon.so I dnt make my blood pressure high.:)
I  also have gestational diabetes. But I live in the hospital so they monitor every thing together. By Monday you are full term. I wish I was 36 weeks. Good luck and congratulations in advance.

37 is full term. I had mine at 37 3 because of hypertension and she was going to do 37 but was busy and wanted to wait till Monday... Lol everything was great. Baby boy was perfect and went home after the normal 2 night stay.
Thank you ladies..congrats and goodluck to y'all too..praying to have us a safe delivery...and healthy baby :)
She will be fine dont stress I had high blood pressure with my first aswell and I had her two weeks early

question: Im scared, coz my blood pressure is too high.im only 36 weeks and 3 days.i wnatvto keep my baby in till atleast 38.but I think they going to take her out on monday or earlier than that.im in labor and delivery since lastnite.they told me to stay so they can watch me closer.i live 1 hour away to the hispital so thats why they told  me its better to stay in the hospital.i dnt mind staying.but im afraid my little girl is not ready yet.do u guys thinks 36 weeks will be ok to be out?
title: scared im 36 weeks 3 days
